body: To the title: Well i dont know, you will instantly labeled a "Society reject", maybe not *the entire society*, hopefully not all people that are Social medias addicts also were Schizophrenia that made them cannot distinguish Reality from Imagination but one degenerate can only hopes. The polices got you on their list... But whos to say, im just doing my business in my own private space.
